name: Creating your Focus

pages.text: A Spellcaster's Focus offers a glimpse into the very fabric of the creator and wielders being, reflecting both their total commitment to magical crafts as well their personal magical journey.$(br2)Creating a powerful focus is a simple but demanding process. Simply imbue an Unlit SpellCaster's Focus and then start casting spells while holding it in your offhand!

pages.title: Spellcaster Reagents
pages.text: When crafting the unlit focus, it is $(l)very important$() that you pick the bottom middle ingredient carefully. Different ingredients imbue the focus with different innate spellcasting attributes; pick one that suits your magical playstyle! Some possible ingredients don't do anything at all, and some even provide negative effects! See the next page for details.

pages.title: Reagent Properties
pages.text: The following describes the available reagents and their provided properties:$(li)Brilliant Diamond: Reduced spell mana cost$(li)Accursed Figurine: Increases damage the wielder takes$(li)Malachite Figurine: Increases duration of spell effects$(li)Resonant Rod: Increases spell damage$(li)Heartstone: Increases potency of spell effects$(li)Lustrous Sphere: Increases spell level$(li)Golden Heart: Increases spell range and AOE$(li)Glistening Ice: Reduces spell cooldown.
